text:
="preserve">Sally Carman (born 9 May 1981) is an English actress, best known for her roles as Kelly Magiure in "Shameless", from 2005 to 2013; and Abi Franklin in "Coronation Street", a role she has played since 2017.
Carman was born in Mexborough, South Yorkshire, the county of England. At the age of 18 years old she attended the LAMDA drama school towards London.
She has also appeared in "Doctors", "Heartbeat", and "Holby City".
